thread.title: Arsenal striker Olivier Giroud a shock target for Marseille after lack of game-time at the Emirates
thread.title_full: Arsenal striker Olivier Giroud a shock target for Marseille after lack of game-time at the Emirates

author: leeastley
title: Arsenal striker Olivier Giroud a shock target for Marseille after lack of game-time at the Emirates
text:
Comments ARSENAL striker Olivier Giroud has emerged as a target for Marseille. 
The Frenchman, 30, has started just six league games for the Gunners with Alexis Sanchez preferred as the frontman by Arsene Wenger. Getty Images Olivier Giroud has made just six Premier League starts for Arsenal this season Arsenal star Olivier Giroud scores second scorpion kick goal in as many weeks 
And according to Goal France, Ligue 1 side Marseille are ready to offer Giroud a way out of the Emirates if he does not get the playing time he wants. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The French giants are looking to improve their attacking threat and see Giroud as an ideal target. 
Chilean Sanchez has cemented his place as the Gunners first-choice attacker and has netted 20 goals this season. 
Former Montpellier striker Giroud has still managed 11 goals even though he has been resigned to substitute appearances for most of the season.
